"スーパーハード受注許可証の所持"

"After some time, Bruder is reunited with <%me>. He speaks of how Crawford rushed off to join the battle against Nilus Stia at the first opportunity, to join Guren in settling their score with it. After that, he reminisces about Hibana, and talks about her personality and her relationship with Crawford and Guren."
